text: Va agar ʙar onho (ja'ne munofiqone ki hukmi toƣutro ʙar hukmi Alloh ʙartar dostand) vociʙ megardondem, ki xestanro ʙikused, jo az sarzaminhojaton ʙerun ʙiraved, cuz sumorai andake az onho cunin namekardand va agar on ciro mekardand, ki ʙa on pand doda mesavand hamono ʙaroi onon ʙehtar va ustuvortar menamud
